## Introduction 

Gets NSE live market data of nifty 50 and F&O stocks. The regular trading session starts from 09.15 hrs to 15.30 hrs (IST). Function reutrns dataframe of live market data along with a message of number of advances, declines and time. 

```{r example}
# Live Nifty 50 data
library(nser)
nselive()

# Live F&O data 
library(nser)
nselive("fo")

```
